title: Was Part of a Twin Towers Scene in ‘Home Alone 2’ Cut for TV?
subtitle: A sky-high scene in "Home Alone 2: Lost in New York" was whittled down for a 2020 television broadcast.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: A portion of a scene in "Home Alone 2: Lost in New York," which depicted the World Trade Center's twin towers, was missing from the film's December 2020 broadcast on the Freeform channel.
